## readingWritingSeparationDecor() function

读写分离 属性装饰器 装饰在属性上

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function readingWritingSeparationDecor(target: object, key: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | object |  |
|  key | string |  |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks


```ts
class N {
  @readingWritingSeparationDecor
  age?: number;
}
// 编译后
 class N {
  age?: number;

  getAge() {
    return this.age
  }

  setAge(age: number) {
    this.age = age
  }
}
```
